verses.verse: To you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
My God, <S%H430><s%> I have trusted <S%H982><s%> in you. <S%H954><s%> Don't let me be shamed. Don't <S%H341><s%> let my enemies triumph over me. <S%H5970><s%>
Yes, <S%H6960><s%> no one who waits for you shall be shamed. <S%H954><s%> They shall be shamed <S%H954><s%> who deal treacherously <S%H898><s%> without cause. <S%H7387><s%>
Show <S%H3045><s%> me your ways, <S%H1870><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Teach <S%H3925><s%> me your paths. <S%H734><s%>
Guide <S%H1869><s%> me in your truth, <S%H571><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> me, <S%H430><s%> For you are the God of my salvation, <S%H3468><s%> I wait <S%H6960><s%> for you all day long. <S%H3117><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> and your loving kindness, <S%H7356><s%> for they are from old times. <S%H5769><s%>

Don't <S%H2142><s%> remember the sins <S%H2403><s%> of my youth, <S%H5271><s%> nor my transgressions. <S%H6588><s%> Remember <S%H2142><s%> me according to your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for your goodness <S%H2898><s%>' sake, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.
Good <S%H2896><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> therefore he will instruct <S%H3384><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
He will guide <S%H1869><s%> the humble <S%H6035><s%> in justice. <S%H4941><s%> He will teach <S%H3925><s%> the humble <S%H6035><s%> his way. <S%H1870><s%>
All the paths <S%H734><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> to such as keep <S%H5341><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> and his testimonies. <S%H5713><s%>
For your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, pardon <S%H5545><s%> my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> for it is great. <S%H7227><s%>
What man <S%H376><s%> is he who fears <S%H3373><s%> Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%> He shall instruct <S%H3384><s%> him in the way <S%H1870><s%> that he shall choose. <S%H977><s%>
His soul <S%H5315><s%> shall dwell <S%H3885><s%> at ease. <S%H2896><s%> His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
The friendship <S%H5475><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is with those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him. <S%H3045><s%> He will show them his covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
My eyes <S%H5869><s%> are ever <S%H8548><s%> on Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he will pluck <S%H3318><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> out of the net. <S%H7568><s%>
Turn <S%H6437><s%> to me, <S%H2603><s%> and have mercy on me, <S%H3173><s%> for I am desolate and afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>
The troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> are enlarged. <S%H7337><s%> Oh bring me out <S%H3318><s%> of my distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
Consider <S%H7200><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%> and my travail. <S%H5999><s%> Forgive <S%H5375><s%> all my sins. <S%H2403><s%>
Consider <S%H7200><s%> my enemies, <S%H341><s%> for they are many. <S%H7231><s%> They hate <S%H8130><s%> me with cruel <S%H2555><s%> hatred. <S%H8135><s%>
Oh keep <S%H8104><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me. <S%H954><s%> Let me not be disappointed, for I take refuge in you. <S%H2620><s%>
Let integrity <S%H8537><s%> and uprightness <S%H3476><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me, <S%H6960><s%> for I wait for you.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> out all of his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
